trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Yakima
There were no other sightings in Yakima on or around August 9th 2010
Summary: Looked like a bright star and moved around unearthly.
divs: sighting details me and my 3 friends (1 was a brother) were all laying on my friends trampoline watching stars in his backyard. we had seen 2 very bright stars and my brother pointed at 1 and said it was an asteriod but we soon noticed that it didnt have a tail or burned out. we watched it move from the spot it started to out to the other side of the sky and when it got there it hovered and dropped then took off again out of site. it wasnt an aircraft because it was slower, made no noise, had no flashing lights or colorful besides its starry white\bright look,and moved in such a way that an aircraft couldnt. it had no tail and stayed in the air for a few minutes. it looked as low as about an airplane and made no noise. we all felt scared and confused. we had no idea what it was and had been joking about ufo's before and seeing a real 1 made us want to know what it was. we lost site of the object when it flew over the trees in the horizon.
